Title: The River at the Center of the World.
Subtitle: A Journey Up the Yangtze, and Back in Chinese Time.
Authors: Simon Winchester.
Categories: Travel.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=qiL4eiCfL64C&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: The author recounts his experiences traveling along the Yangtze river from the Tibetan border to the East China Sea, vividly bringing to life China's rich cultural history, politics, people, geography, and climate. Reprint..
